nodes.text: Measel Junco was a famous cyborg long-hauler who worked as a columnist for the Independent Traders' Infonet. At some point Junco decided to retire from traveling along the Corellian Trade Spine and received many messages of support from friends and other long-haulers. However, the Corellian Engineering Corporation showed Junco around a YT-1300 light freighter and the cyborg subsequently obtained a YT-1300 and chose not to retire. CEC later included a quote from Junco in the CEC YT-1300 Marketing Catalog.
